name: Viral Puppy 🐶
description: Presenting the [>HUMAN MALWARE SERiES<]: Nicknamed the ‘Viral Puppy’ due to a playful appearance. In simple terms, the puppy virus reverts the infected into a child-like state, unable to process anything remotely logical and/or serious. The smallest of lab engineered bio-nano-units with an average size of 0.0000003 microns, no known mask can be used to filter it. 👽 By @ViNNiKiNiKi  🌐 MORE INFO: https://vinnikiniki.com/project/coronavirus-art-series/
